metadata.Title: CVE-2021-40403 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An information disclosure vulnerability exists in the pick-and-place rotation parsing functionality of Gerbv 2.7.0 and dev (commit b5f1eacd), and Gerbv forked 2.8.0. A specially-crafted pick-and-place file can exploit the missing initialization of a structure to leak memory contents. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gerbv package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
